titleStmt.title: The muses fire-works upon the fifth of November: or, The protestants remembrancer of the bloody designs of the Papists in the never-to-be-forgotten Powder-Plot, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Miller at the Gilded Acorn in St. Paul's Church-yard, near the little North Door.,

notesStmt.note: First line of text: "Hail happy hour, wherein that hellish plot ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Gilded Acorn in St. Paul's Church-yard, near the little North Door.
